title: Commercial paper issuances touch a 4-year high of Rs 1.2 lakh crore
description: CP issuances are still not as high as 2018 levels when they touched ₹3.1 lakh crore in July-September, as NBFCs look for other funding avenues like securitisation, where volumes peaked in FY24 at ₹1.9 lakh crore. CPs are short-term, unsecured debt instruments issued by corporates.
